General.Name: Elektrotsink ao
General.Description: Electrozink Public Joint-Stock Company produces and sells various non-ferrous metallurgy products in Russia. Its non-ferrous metallurgy product includes zinc, zinc-aluminum alloys, and cadmium; non-ferrous metallurgy chemical products, including sulfuric acids; and lead products. The company was founded in 1898 and is based in Verkhnyaya Pyshma, Russia.
